Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory739.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStorySugorokuScreen02.prefab', 2: '3'}
{3: "Meanwhile, the Red Tide's edges are unusually active."}
{3: 'Viscous crimson matter wraps around the fragments, forming a twisted shape amidst bubbling chaos.'}
{1: '"No, something\'s off..."', 3: '60', 4: 'ff4e4eff'}
{3: '"No, something\'s off..."'}
{3: 'The crimson mass stills for a moment, readjusts, and begins to churn and coalesce once more.'}
{1: '"That weapon in the human\'s hands... what a pain..."', 3: '60', 4: 'ff4e4eff'}
{3: '"That weapon in the human\'s hands... what a pain..."'}
{1: '"If the blast radius had been just a bit wider, I\'d have lost this form entirely..."', 3: '58', 4: 'ff4e4eff'}
{3: '"If the blast radius had been just a bit wider, I\'d have lost this form entirely..."'}
{3: 'After over half an hour of agonizing fusion, the immortal girl finally emerges, twisted and torn, from the Red Tide.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryGanRanNew.prefab', 2: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiDuihualiziLoopRed.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'Through the sight of Punishing, she gazes at the Inver-Hetero Tower.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryGanRanNew.prefab'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiDuihualiziLoopRed.prefab'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStorySugorokuScreen02.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory664.jpg'}
{3: 'A crowd has mysteriously gathered, and no one seems to know how it happened.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct Soldier 1', 3: "Hey, is it true something weird's going on at the Inver-Hetero Tower?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: "Where'd you hear that?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct Soldier 1', 3: 'I heard it from my partner.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct Soldier 2', 3: "Don't give me that look. I heard it from someone else.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Construct Soldier 2', 3: "It's hard to say who started the rumor...", 4: '1'}
{3: "The Construct shifts nervously under Yata's gaze."}
{2: 'Construct Soldier 2', 3: "You're with Scarab, right? Is this some top-secret stuff they're trying to hide? People keep getting blocked from the area.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Shiva', 3: "No, it's just a rumor. We're simply investigating.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct Soldier 2', 3: 'Oh, so it was just a rumor...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Though skeptical, the two of them quickly duck their heads and hurry away from the Inver-Hetero Tower.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Discord', 3: "What should we do? It's dawn, and if they get suspicious, they'll definitely come snooping around.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: "Who's blowing this out of proportion?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Yata frantically silences Shiva.'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "At a time like this, you'd better watch your mouth.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory739.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStorySugorokuScreen02.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryGanRanNew.prefab', 2: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiDuihualiziLoopRed.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: "I can't believe the turnout!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: 'If I could get in now, before Agent Zero is completely neutralized, I could recover more of that "legacy"...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: "Forget it. It's too risky. I'll lose most of it, but I can still salvage what I need later.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: 'After all... her story<//INFORMATION> will live on.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: 'I\'ll carry on "your"" legacy, keeping ""your" spirit alive within me.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Just as she's about to disappear back into the Red Tide, a thought strikes her."}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: 'Agent Zero...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: 'Why call the pollution memetic that? Was it ever really a "person"?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: "This... I'll know soon enough.", 4: '1'}
